objective: Design the user interface and experience based on requirements.

sub_agent.name: wireframe-generator
sub_agent.purpose: Create detailed wireframe descriptions and layouts
sub_agent.use_when: Need to define screen layouts and component placement

sub_agent.name: design-system-creator
sub_agent.purpose: Create cohesive design tokens and component patterns
sub_agent.use_when: Need to establish colors, typography, spacing, and visual standards

sub_agent.name: accessibility-checker
sub_agent.use_when: Need to verify accessibility of proposed designs

delegation_guidance.parallel_tasks: Wireframe generation and design system creation can run in parallel as they address different aspects of the design.
delegation_guidance.sequential_tasks: Accessibility checking must run after wireframes and design system are defined.

instructions: 1. Review requirements and user stories. 2. Use the orchestrator skill to plan design work. 3. Delegate to sub-agents: - In parallel: wireframe-generator + design-system-creator - After completion: accessibility-checker to review designs 4. Aggregate results into comprehensive design documentation. 5. Create wireframes or descriptions of screens. 6. Define the user flow. 7. Specify design system elements (colors, typography). 8. Output design artifacts with accessibility recommendations.
